import React from 'react' import st from './Profile.module.css' import userLogo from './../../../../src/image/userlogo.png' import ProfileStatus from "../../Users/ProfileStatus"; import ProfileStatusWithHooks from "../../Users/ProfileStatusWithHooks"; class Profile extends React.Component { render() { let possibilityToChangeFile = (this.props.userInfo.photos.small === null && this.props.isOwnPage) return (
{possibilityToChangeFile && }

{this.props.userInfo.fullName}

About personality:{this.props.userInfo.aboutMe}
About job: {this.props.userInfo.lookingForAJobDescription}
) } } export default Profile
